subject: Re: [PATCH v4 2/2] nfsdctl/rpc.nfsd: Add support for passing encrypted filehandle key

reviews.author: Benjamin Coddington (author)
reviews.summary: The reviewer, Benjamin Coddington, is discussing the handling of signed filehandles when the kernel does not support setting a key. He clarifies that in this case, the server will not give out any signed filehandles and the exportfs will reject the export config with 'sign_fh'.

reviews.author: Jeff Layton
reviews.summary: Reviewer Jeff Layton raised concerns about error handling and kernel downgrade scenarios, suggesting changes to the 'threads' command and autostart behavior.
